title: Practice Mindfulness
description: Take 5 minutes each day to sit quietly and focus on your breath. Notice your thoughts without judgment.

title: Digital Detox
description: Set aside time each day to disconnect from digital devices. Try reading a book or going for a walk instead.

title: Sleep Hygiene
description: Establish a consistent sleep schedule. Avoid screens before bedtime and create a relaxing bedtime routine.

title: Hydration
description: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily. Proper hydration improves mood, cognition, and physical health.

title: Gratitude Journal
description: Write down three things you're grateful for each day. This practice can shift your focus to positive aspects of life.

title: Movement Breaks
description: Take short movement breaks during study sessions. Even 5 minutes of stretching can improve focus and reduce stress.

title: Connect with Others
description: Schedule time to connect with friends or family. Social connections are vital for mental wellbeing.

title: Limit Caffeine
description: Reduce caffeine intake, especially in the afternoon and evening, to improve sleep quality.

title: Set Realistic Goals
description: Break large tasks into smaller, manageable steps. Celebrate small victories along the way.

title: Practice Self-Compassion
description: Treat yourself with the same kindness you would offer to a good friend. Everyone makes mistakes.

title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
description: Use the 5-4-3-2-1 method to focus on your senses and ground yourself in the present moment, especially during moments of anxiety.
